data.title: Obituary of John Junior Wright
data.meta_description: John Junior Wright, age 93, died Saturday, May 20, 2023, at Holbrook Healthcare Center in Buckhannon, WV. He was born October 12, 1929, in Fairmont,
data.text: John Junior Wright, age 93, died Saturday, May 20, 2023, at Holbrook Healthcare Center in Buckhannon, WV. He was born October 12, 1929, in Fairmont, WV, a son of the late John W. and Pearl Beam Wright. In addition to his parents, he was preceded in death by two sisters, Mary Holmes and Betty Toothman and one brother, Robert Wright. He is survived by one daughter, Vicki Vance and husband Mark of Ellamore, WV; one brother, Franklin “Bud” Wright and wife Lorraine “Tootsie” of Inwood, WV and several nieces and nephews. He served in the U. S. Air Force and was a heavy equipment operator. In honoring, Mr. Wright’s wishes, he will be cremated. Online condolences may be made to the family at www.polingstclair.com. Poling-St. Clair Funeral Home is in charge of the arrangements.
